Example code¶

Main-example¶

Sphinx allow easy reference to illustrate code in the documentation

e.g. the hellow_world module can be reproduced

def hello_world():
    """ hello world """
    return "hello cma"


def hello_all():
    """ hello world """
    return "hello all"

e.g.

def this_one():
    "a test print function"
    print("this")

Sub-example¶

e.g.

def this_one():
    "a test print function"
    print("this")
